description:
Arcade has done a collab with a man that knows a thing or two about ridges. This version of the Ridge belt is classic black with Jimmy’s bright red name seal logo by the buckle, adding a pop of colour and a bit of "if you know, you know" cool. Made from Repreve recycled polyester and paired with Arcade’s updated buckle, this belt it keeps your pants up wherever you're headed, whatever you're doing. Goes with your snow pants, jeans or fancy pants. Yes, it really is that versatile.

  • 10% of sales from every Jimmy Chin belt sold goes to Protect Our Winters, helping to fight climate change on our planet
  • Stretchy elastic webbing uses Repreve® recycled polyester (85%), is super comfy, and does away with finding the perfect hole
  • Updated buckle design curves with your body, offers even smoother operation, better retention, and improved durability
  • Buckle allows for precise adjustment, is easy to open and close, and won’t pinch while you play
  • Metal-free design is great for travel – no need to take it off at the airport
  • One-size design fits up to 40in. waists
  • Machine washable in case of spillage
name: Arcade Ridge Jimmy Chin Belt - Unisex
